50 Years Helping Injured Individuals In Columbus Recover Compensation

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Content” module_class=”fl-darklinks” _builder_version=”4.3.2″ text_text_color=”#322c14″ text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”-0.3px” text_line_height=”1.54em” link_font=”||||on||||” link_text_color=”#322c14″ width=”90%” max_width=”520px” max_width_tablet=”1024px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Established in 1968, Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, helps Ohio residents recover compensation for a broad range of personal injuries.

If you are seeking an attorney to help you recover compensation for auto accident injuries, hospital mistakes or injuries caused by defective products, you want a law firm that has the commitment, work ethic, recognition and reputation for getting results. We are that firm.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.3.2″ background_image=”/wp-content/uploads/sites/1402039/2019/10/iStock-518335452.jpg” custom_padding_tablet=”|20px||20px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” background_last_edited=”on|desktop” background_enable_image_tablet=”off”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/sites/1402039/2019/10/iStock-518335452.jpg” alt=”Mod Top Left” align=”right” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|phone” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.3.2″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_duration=”1950ms” animation_intensity_slide=”6%” animation_speed_curve=”ease-in”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.3.2″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”130px||128px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||60px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”50px||50px||true|false” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1850ms” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”6%” animation_speed_curve=”ease” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.3.2″ max_width=”737px” module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” module_class=”fl-home-heading” _builder_version=”4.3.2″ header_2_text_color=”#0c0c0b” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_letter_spacing=”-1px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||30px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||10px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_text_align_tablet=”center” header_2_text_align_phone=”” header_2_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

We Have A Long History Of Success

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.3.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.3.2″ custom_padding=”|10px||10px|false|true”][et_pb_blurb admin_label=”Case” module_class=”fl-blurb-case” _builder_version=”4.3.2″ body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.6em” body_link_font=”|700||on|on||||” body_link_text_color=”#9fc35c” body_link_font_size=”16px” background_color=”#221f1e” background_image=”/wp-content/uploads/sites/1402039/2019/10/bg-results.jpg” height=”100%” height_tablet=”100%” height_phone=”100%” height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”41px|36px|80px|36px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”30px|10px|45px|10px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”14px” body_font_size_phone=”” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet”]

for truck driver who was filling his tank with gas and was crushed by another truck.

See More Results[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.3.2″ max_width=”737px” module_alignment=”center”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.27.4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Content” _builder_version=”4.3.2″ text_text_color=”#322c14″ text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”-0.3px” text_line_height=”1.54em” link_font=”||||on||||” link_text_color=”#322c14″ text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”40px||||false|false” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

For nearly 50 years, we have established a reputation for getting results. Our attorneys have recovered tens of millions of dollars for clients through the years. Because of our success, insurance companies know that we will spend the time it takes to get our clients top dollar.

Many of our attorneys have earned distinguished awards, including an AV Preeminent* rating from Martindale-Hubbell and selection in Ohio Super Lawyers. Some of our attorneys are also certified as civil trial advocates by the National Board of Trial Advocacy, a certification limited to a select number of attorneys in the state.
